title: Multiple dyes applications for fluorescent convertible polymer capsules as macrophages tracking labels
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Zhanna V. Kozyreva, Polina A. Demina, Anastasiia Yu Sapach, Daria A. Terentyeva, Olga I. Gusliakova, Anna M. Abramova, Irina Yu Goryacheva, Daria B. Trushina, Gleb B. Sukhorukov, Olga A. Sindeeva
